BadgeDetail.Name: Entrepreneurship
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated the key attributes associated with being a successful entrepreneur. They are focussed and persistent, are rational and well organised. They think critically and can self-reflect.

Task.Title: Entrepreneur
Task.Body: Upload a 2 minute video that provide examples of how you have demonstrated at least 5 of the following attributes:Excellent communication skillsConstantly learning Well organisedCritical thinkingSelf reflectionPersuasionFocussedCreativeCuriousRational judgement
Task.HtmlBody:
Upload a 2 minute video that provide examples of how you have demonstrated at least 5 of the following attributes:

  • Excellent communication skills
  • Constantly learning
  • Well organised
  • Critical thinking
  • Self reflection
  • Persuasion
  • Focussed
  • Creative
  • Curious
  • Rational judgement
Task.TextileBody:
Upload a 2 minute video that provide examples of how you have demonstrated at least 5 of the following attributes:

* Excellent communication skills
* Constantly learning 
* Well organised
* Critical thinking
* Self reflection
* Persuasion
